start_boss.text: I would not have thought such monsters existed!

retreat.text: As you say. Back to drawing board.

out_of_missiles.text: Gun is empty, damn it to hell!

running.text: The hairs on the back of my neck are... upstanding...

hull_90.text: I assume I get big bonus for this?
Stupid fools push me too far!

hull_50.text: Damn it, damn it, damn it! This is not possible!

hull_30.text: My life is... flashing... before my eyes...

overload.text: Damn it to hell! I do not see what is going on!
Damn it to hell! This is broken junk!

victory.text: At this rate, I soon be perfect!
Ha ha ha! All evil has been lifted and separated.
